content: who wants some sushi with this free sushi amigurumi pattern recipe you will master the culinary arts of crochet sushi this delicious set includes nigiris such as salmon tuna tamago egg shrimp roe and the ever classic california roll mix and match to create your own yummy sushi crochet combination and see what your inner sushi chef dishes up **level ** easy **size ** approximately 1 5 to 2 in width **yarn ** acrlyic worsted weight yarn ************************************** i d love to see how your projects turn out let me know what creative ways you use your sushi crochet for be sure to tag me with your projects on my instagram 1 or facebook 2 you can also subscribe to my youtube channel 3 to get all the latest video tutorials happy crocheting 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //www facebook com/amiamourfan 3 https //www youtube com/c/amiamour
